description.en: A little Lykan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: A little Lykan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: Pequeno Lykan que segue seu mestre e coleta itens caídos.
description.cns: 一只小莱肯跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein treuer Gefährte. Sammelt deine Gegenstände auf.
description.fi: A little Lykan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.fil: A little Lykan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.fr: Suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les monstres. Augmente également les statistiques de son maître quand des perles sont équipées.
description.id: Little Lykan yang setia mengikuti pemiliknya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: A little Lykan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: リトル・ライカンを召喚し、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 하이브리드 라이칸이 따라다니며 주변의 아이템을 자동 습득 합니다.
description.nl: A little Lykan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.pl: A little Lykan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.ru: A little Lykan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.sp: Un pequeñito Lykan que sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: A little Lykan that follows its master around and picks up dropped items.
description.th: little Lykanที่ตามเจ้านายของมันไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 小拉肯跟著它的主人四處走走並撿起掉落的道具。
description.vi: Một con Lykan nhỏ theo chủ nhân của nó xung quanh và nhặt các vật phẩm bị đánh rơi.
